answers.author: Tad McGalliard
answers.text:
Greg, I would have them contact the city managers in places like Dubuque, IA; Asheville, NC and Chattanooga, TN if it's a small to mid-sized jurisdiction.


Greg, I would have them contact the city managers in places like Dubuque, IA; Asheville, NC and Chattanooga, TN if it's a small to mid-sized jurisdiction.

answers.author: Ashley Greiber
answers.text:
Greg, please have them visit www.waunakee.com/village all of the documents are located in our document center.  This information is available.  If they need more information please contact me at agreiber@vil.waunakee.wi.us  The Village of Waunakee implimented this project in the last 10 years.

answers.author: Michael Van Milligen
answers.text:
Greg,
Dubuque is a city of 60,000. We have redeveloped our downtown, riverfront (we have had about $500 milliion in investment in these two) and are in the process of redeveloping our original manufacturing district (about $40 million of a $200 million plan is underway) and one of more economically challlenged neighborhoods. I would be happy to visit with you or you could talk to Economic Develoment Director Dave Heiar (563-589-4393) or City Planner Laura Carstens (563-589-4210). Our web-site is www.cityofdubuque.org.
Mike

Thanks everyone. I passed on your information.  I appreciate your help.

author: Gregory Stopka
text: I'd like information on RFPs issued by other municipalities for downtown redevelopments especially if they involved sustainability.  A member community is pursuing a Village Center and RFP examples would be very helpful.
title: RFP examples for Downtown Redevelopment
